data.title: Supreme Scarface The World is Yours Hooded Sweatshirt
data.meta_description: Let everyone know your not playing any games with the Supreme Scarface The World is Yours Hoodie Sweatshirt. data.text:
Let everyone know your not playing any games with the Supreme Scarface The World is Yours Hoodie Sweatshirt. Part of the special Fall/Winter 2017 collection with Universal Pictures, this hooded sweatshirt was one of the standout pieces of the collection. The main focus of the full bodied print is the custom gold globe statue, turned desk lamp, with the popular quote embossed around the globe. But the entire image is a scene from the movie when Tony Montana’s mansion gets invaded by some guys who don’t like him too much. You’ll have to watch the movie to find out what happens. Made from cotton fleece with classic pouch pocket, the pullover hoodie is as comfy as it gets. The Supreme logo was added to the hood just in case you forgot what brand could pull off a collab of this caliber. The Supreme Scarface The World is Yours Hooded Sweatshirt released and sold out the same day, when it was made available online and in most Supreme shops on October 12th.

Supreme Scarface The World is Yours Hoodie

Retail: $188

Release Date: 10/12/2017
